verses.verse: And the chief <S%H7218><s%> fathers <S%H1><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, came near <S%H7126><s%>, and spoke <S%H1696><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and before <S%H6440><s%> the princes <S%H5387><s%>, the chief <S%H7218><s%> fathers <S%H1><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>:

And they said <S%H559><s%>, The Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> by lot <S%H1486><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and my lord <S%H113><s%> was commanded <S%H6680><s%> by the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%> our brother <S%H251><s%> unto his daughters <S%H1323><s%>.

And if they be married <S%H802><s%> to any <S%H259><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the other tribes <S%H7626><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, then shall their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> be taken <S%H1639><s%> from the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of our fathers <S%H1><s%>, and shall be put <S%H3254><s%> to the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> unto what they are received <S%H1639><s%>: so shall it be taken from the lot <S%H1486><s%> of our inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

And when the jubile <S%H3104><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be <S%H5159><s%>, then shall their inheritance be put <S%H3254><s%> unto the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> unto what they are received <S%H5159><s%>: so shall their inheritance be taken away <S%H1639><s%> from the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of our fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> according to the word <S%H6310><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, The tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> has said well <S%H1696><s%>.

This is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> does command <S%H6680><s%> concerning the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Let them marry <S%H802><s%> to whom they think <S%H5869><s%> best <S%H2896><s%>; only to the family <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of their father <S%H1><s%> shall they marry <S%H802><s%>.

So shall not the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> remove <S%H5437><s%> from tribe <S%H4294><s%> to tribe <S%H4294><s%>: for every one <S%H376><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall keep <S%H1692><s%> himself to the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of his fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And every daughter <S%H1323><s%>, that possesseth <S%H3423><s%> an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> in any tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, shall be wife <S%H802><s%> unto one <S%H259><s%> of the family <S%H4940><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of her father <S%H1><s%>, that the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> may enjoy <S%H3423><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of his fathers <S%H1><s%>.

Neither shall the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> remove <S%H5437><s%> from one tribe <S%H4294><s%> to another <S%H312><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%>; but every one <S%H376><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall keep <S%H1692><s%> himself to his own inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.
Even as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>, so did <S%H6213><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%>:

For Mahlah <S%H4244><s%>, Tirzah <S%H8656><s%>, and Hoglah <S%H2295><s%>, and Milcah <S%H4435><s%>, and Noah <S%H5270><s%>, the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%>, were married <S%H802><s%> unto their father <S%H1730><s%>'s brothers <S%H1121><s%>' sons:

And they were married <S%H802><s%> into the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, and their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> remained in the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the family <S%H4940><s%> of their father <S%H1><s%>.

These are the commandments <S%H4687><s%> and the judgments <S%H4941><s%>, which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> by Jordan <S%H3383><s%> near Jericho <S%H3405><s%>.
